title: An Email to a Friend
english_text:
Hi Alex,

Thanks so much for your invitation to go to the cinema next weekend. It sounds great!

I'm really sorry, but I don't think I can make it. My cousins are visiting from another city, and we have a big family get-together planned for Saturday. I haven't seen them for ages, so I really can't miss it.

How about the following weekend? I'm free then. We could catch that new sci-fi film everyone is talking about. Let me know if that works for you.

Best wishes,

Chris
chinese_translation:
嗨，亚历克斯，

非常感谢你下周末邀请我去看电影。这听起来太棒了！

我真的很抱歉，但我想我可能去不了。我的堂兄弟们要从另一个城市过来玩，我们计划在周六举行一个大型的家庭聚会。我已经很久没见到他们了，所以我真的不能错过。

下下个周末怎么样？我那时有空。我们可以去看那部大家都在讨论的新科幻电影。如果时间可以的话，请告诉我。

最好的祝愿，

克里斯

title: My Favourite Hobby
english_text:
Do you have a hobby that you love? For me, it's photography. I started about two years ago when my dad gave me his old camera.

I love taking photos of nature, especially animals and flowers. It makes me look at the world more carefully. I spend most of my weekends outdoors, trying to find the perfect shot. Sometimes my friends come with me, and we have a lot of fun together.

Photography is a wonderful hobby because it's creative and relaxing. It has taught me to be patient and to see the beauty in small things.
chinese_translation:
你有什么你热爱的爱好吗？对‍我来说，是摄影。我大约是两年前开始的，当时我爸爸把他‍的旧相机给了我。

我喜欢拍摄大自然的照片，特别是动物和花朵。它让我更仔细地观察这个世界。我大部分的周末都在户外度过，试图找到完美的拍摄瞬间。有时我的朋友会和我一起，我们一起玩得很开心。

摄影是一个很棒的爱好，因为它既有创造性又令人放松。它教会了我耐心，也让我看到了微小事物中的美。
